LOLWeaponsMod:MyRelic.NAME: Test Relic
LOLWeaponsMod:MyRelic.FLAVOR: This person is too lazy to write anything.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw #b1 card.

LOLWeaponsMod:JvSheZhiYa.NAME: Serpent's Fang
LOLWeaponsMod:JvSheZhiYa.FLAVOR: Serpent fangs pierce illusory protection, truth flows with venom.
DESCRIPTIONS: When #yAttacking a single target, remove the enemy's #yBlock .

LOLWeaponsMod:JingJiZhiJia.NAME: Thornmail
LOLWeaponsMod:JingJiZhiJia.FLAVOR: Every wound transforms into a spike, repaying pain a hundredfold.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain [#3DBD87]2 Thorns[] .

LOLWeaponsMod:XinZhiGang.NAME: Heartsteel
LOLWeaponsMod:XinZhiGang.FLAVOR: Every heartbeat is a war drum, every pulse an accumulation of strength.
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #y50 Max HP. NL At the start of turn #r3 , apply #ylolweaponsmod:Colossal Devour to ALL enemies.

LOLWeaponsMod:SanXiangZhiLi.NAME: Trinity Force
LOLWeaponsMod:SanXiangZhiLi.FLAVOR: Speed, strength, wisdom—trinity in one, achieving immortality.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #y33 Gold, #r3 Max HP. NL At the start of turn #y3 , gain #y3 : NL #rStrength , #gDexterity , #bFocus , #yEnergy , #bBlock , [#808080]Metallicize[] , #rVigor , #yArtifact , #pMantra , [#3DBD87]Thorns[] .

LOLWeaponsMod:YanHenSuoLian.NAME: Chain of Annihilation
LOLWeaponsMod:YanHenSuoLian.FLAVOR: She swore to spend her life destroying him......
DESCRIPTIONS: The Corrupt Heart loses Death Knell and Invincible.

LOLWeaponsMod:TiYaMaTe.NAME: Tiamat
LOLWeaponsMod:TiYaMaTe.FLAVOR: Where the giant blade reaches, flesh recedes like the tide.
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacking a single target, deal #y25% damage to other enemies.

LOLWeaponsMod:WuZhongHenYi.NAME: Endless Despair
LOLWeaponsMod:WuZhongHenYi.FLAVOR: Death is but dormancy; hatred knows no end.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, deal damage equal to your [#C0C0C0]Block[] to a random enemy.

LOLWeaponsMod:KuangTuKaiJia.NAME: Warmog's Armor
LOLWeaponsMod:KuangTuKaiJia.FLAVOR: Scars are its medals; bathing in blood is its ritual.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #y4 Max HP. At the start of combat, gain [#00FF7F]Regen[] . NL Whenever you increase Max HP, increase [#00FF7F]Regen[] by #y1 .

LOLWeaponsMod:QianBianZheJiaXiu.NAME: Jak'Sho, the Protean
DESCRIPTIONS: When gaining [#C0C0C0]Block[] , gain #y2 more.

LOLWeaponsMod:HaiKeSiKeJiQiangRen.NAME: Hextech Gunblade
LOLWeaponsMod:HaiKeSiKeJiQiangRen.FLAVOR: The marriage of magic and steel births destructive offspring.
DESCRIPTIONS: Skill cards and Attack cards you draw are swapped. NL ...Perhaps it needs an upgrade?

LOLWeaponsMod:DuoMiNiKeLingZhuDeZhiYi.NAME: Lord Dominik's Regards
LOLWeaponsMod:DuoMiNiKeLingZhuDeZhiYi.FLAVOR: Regards? No, this is the loser's final ultimatum.
DESCRIPTIONS: Giant Slayer: All BOSSES lose #y25% Max HP.

LOLWeaponsMod:EHuXiaoFu.NAME: Hearthbound Axe
LOLWeaponsMod:EHuXiaoFu.FLAVOR: Hell's embers whisper on the axe edge, craving fresh flesh.
DESCRIPTIONS: When using an Attack card, apply #b1 [#32CD32]Poison[] randomly.

LOLWeaponsMod:TouJiZheZhiRen.NAME: Opportunist's Blade
LOLWeaponsMod:TouJiZheZhiRen.FLAVOR: A gambler's blade always aims for maximum profit, even at the cost of the abyss.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #y1 [#FFD700]Gold[] per attack.

LOLWeaponsMod:WuYaoZhiHuo.NAME: Lich Bane
LOLWeaponsMod:WuYaoZhiHuo.FLAVOR: The lich's curse etches magic into bone marrow; each swing is an incantation.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first attack in each combat deals #b6 additional damage. NL At the start of each turn, gain #b4 #rVigor .

LOLWeaponsMod:AnYanHuoJu.NAME: Umbral Torch
LOLWeaponsMod:AnYanHuoJu.FLAVOR: What lights the path is not radiance, but soul-devouring black flame.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, deal #y5 damage.

LOLWeaponsMod:BaWangXueKai.NAME: Tyrant's Bloodmail
LOLWeaponsMod:BaWangXueKai.FLAVOR: Drenched in the blood of thousands, it becomes the immortal tyrant's second skin.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP, gain #y1 [#FF6347]Strength[] (up to #y3 ). NL ...Or perhaps... at least?

LOLWeaponsMod:FenTian.NAME: Sundered Sky
LOLWeaponsMod:FenTian.FLAVOR: When the sky ignites, mortals know they are but kindling.
DESCRIPTIONS: During BOSS fights, double the damage of the first Attack card each turn and heal #b4 HP.

LOLWeaponsMod:GuiSuoDeKuangBaoZhiRen.NAME: Guinsoo's Rageblade
LOLWeaponsMod:GuiSuoDeKuangBaoZhiRen.FLAVOR: The blade's hungry hum is a final ultimatum devouring sanity.
DESCRIPTIONS: Each turn, after playing #y3 Attack cards, draw #y1 card.

LOLWeaponsMod:ShuoJiZhiMao.NAME: Spear of Shojin
LOLWeaponsMod:ShuoJiZhiMao.FLAVOR: Forged from arctic ice, the spearhead pierces time's veil.
DESCRIPTIONS: Each turn, after playing #y3 Skill cards, draw #y1 card.

LOLWeaponsMod:NaWoLiXunRen.NAME: Navori Quickblades
LOLWeaponsMod:NaWoLiXunRen.FLAVOR: The blade's afterimage outpaces its light; death is the sole witness.
DESCRIPTIONS: Each turn, after playing #y4 cards, reduce a random card in your hand to #y0 cost.

LOLWeaponsMod:XingShi.NAME: Eclipse
LOLWeaponsMod:XingShi.FLAVOR: The moon ever ascends, radiance and shadow converge!
DESCRIPTIONS: Each turn, after playing two cards, gain #b2 Block and deal #r2 damage to ALL enemies.

LOLWeaponsMod:LanShuiJing.NAME: Sapphire Crystal
LOLWeaponsMod:LanShuiJing.FLAVOR: The ocean's soul pulses within the crystal, awaiting awakening.
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing your first Strike or Defend each turn, gain #y1 [E].

LOLWeaponsMod:MieShiZheDeSiWangZhiMao.NAME: Rabadon's Deathcap
LOLWeaponsMod:MieShiZheDeSiWangZhiMao.FLAVOR: As fingertips brush the brim, you hear stars shattering.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first Skill card played each turn is played #y2 times.

LOLWeaponsMod:BingChuanYuanDun.NAME: Glacial Buckler
LOLWeaponsMod:BingChuanYuanDun.FLAVOR: Frost spreads across the shield, freezing every heartbeat.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, apply #y1 [#00BFFF]Weak[] to ALL enemies.

LOLWeaponsMod:ShenYuanMianJu.NAME: Abyssal Mask
LOLWeaponsMod:ShenYuanMianJu.FLAVOR: The Void's gaze makes even the bravest soul tremble.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, apply #y1 [#FF4500]Vulnerable[] to ALL enemies.

LOLWeaponsMod:FuWenDiaoKeZhe.NAME: Rune Carver
LOLWeaponsMod:FuWenDiaoKeZhe.FLAVOR: World runes flow between fingers, rewriting reality's laws.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, apply #y1 [#9370DB]Mark[] to a random enemy. NL When obtained, add a [#DE548A]Reshape[] to your deck.

LOLWeaponsMod:JiuShu.NAME: Redemption
LOLWeaponsMod:JiuShu.FLAVOR: When despair shrouds the battlefield, holy light pierces the gloom.
DESCRIPTIONS: When HP is below #r30 , gain #y3 [#00FF7F]Regen[] .

LOLWeaponsMod:ZhiGaoTianNuoYan.NAME: Celestial Promise
LOLWeaponsMod:ZhiGaoTianNuoYan.FLAVOR: A vow witnessed by stars, heavy enough to crush kingdoms.
DESCRIPTIONS: When obtained, gain #y999 [#FFD700]Gold[] .

LOLWeaponsMod:EMoFaDian.NAME: Fiendish Codex
LOLWeaponsMod:EMoFaDian.FLAVOR: Unfinished forbidden spells surge between pages, awaiting sacrificial ink.
DESCRIPTIONS: When obtained, remove a card.

LOLWeaponsMod:SiWangZhiWu.NAME: Deaths Dance
LOLWeaponsMod:SiWangZhiWu.FLAVOR: Dancing on the string between life and death, wounds are but unfinished movements.
DESCRIPTIONS: Incoming damage [#808080]delays for 1 turn[] .

LOLWeaponsMod:ShouHuTianShi.NAME: Guardian Angel
LOLWeaponsMod:ShouHuTianShi.FLAVOR: Wings shield against the reaper's scythe, at the cost of an eternal fragment of self.
DESCRIPTIONS: When receiving [#FF0000]lethal damage[] , halve Max HP and [#00FF00]resurrect at full HP[] .

LOLWeaponsMod:ShouJiZhe.NAME: The Collector
LOLWeaponsMod:ShouJiZhe.FLAVOR: The barrel whispers: 'What's priceless isn't the item, but the fear at the end'.
DESCRIPTIONS: When [#32CD32]executing[] an enemy, gain #y10 [#FFD700]Gold[] .

LOLWeaponsMod:FuYongXingYaoShui.NAME: Refillable Potion
LOLWeaponsMod:FuYongXingYaoShui.FLAVOR: Moonlight in the bottle brims eternally; a sip brings rebirth.
DESCRIPTIONS: After combat, if the potion slot is [#ADD8E6]empty[] , gain a random potion.

LOLWeaponsMod:ShenShengZhiJian.NAME: Divine Sword
LOLWeaponsMod:ShenShengZhiJian.FLAVOR: The blade refracts celestial radiance; darkness evaporates before touch.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #y1 [#DE548A]Ritual[] .

LOLWeaponsMod:MiKaiErDeZhuFu.NAME: Mikael's Blessing
LOLWeaponsMod:MiKaiErDeZhuFu.FLAVOR: Sacred spring water purges worldly filth; even curses turn to nectar.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #y1 random [#9370DB]Power[] .

LOLWeaponsMod:JuRenYaoDai.NAME: Giant's Belt
LOLWeaponsMod:JuRenYaoDai.FLAVOR: A titan warrior's girdle; mortals gain mountain strength by wearing it.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #y10 [#FF4500]Temporary HP[] .

LOLWeaponsMod:BuJia.NAME: Cloth Armor
LOLWeaponsMod:BuJia.FLAVOR: Sackcloth soaked in blood and sweat—the first witness of legends.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #y1 [#C0C0C0]Metallicize[] .

LOLWeaponsMod:LingQiaoPiFeng.NAME: Agile Cloak
LOLWeaponsMod:LingQiaoPiFeng.FLAVOR: Wind sprites frolic in the weave, granting speed beyond sight.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #y1 [#FF6347]Strength[] .

LOLWeaponsMod:ChangJian.NAME: Long Sword
LOLWeaponsMod:ChangJian.FLAVOR: Steel-extended arm, chronicling thousands of life-and-death duels.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #y1 [#FF6347]Strength[] .

LOLWeaponsMod:XianNvHuFu.NAME: Faerie Charm
LOLWeaponsMod:XianNvHuFu.FLAVOR: Forest spirit's tear crystallized, whispering nature's secrets in the palm.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b%d [E] (Stacks).

LOLWeaponsMod:KangMoDouPeng.NAME: Null-Magic Mantle
LOLWeaponsMod:KangMoDouPeng.FLAVOR: Dragon-scale lining turns curses into breezes.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #y2 [#9370DB]Plated Armor[] .

LOLWeaponsMod:SuoZiJia.NAME: Chain Vest
LOLWeaponsMod:SuoZiJia.FLAVOR: A thousand interlocked vows, closer to eternity than any shield.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #y2 [#C0C0C0]Metallicize[] .

LOLWeaponsMod:ZhiLiaoBaoZhu.NAME: Rejuvenation Bead
LOLWeaponsMod:ZhiLiaoBaoZhu.FLAVOR: Eden's dew congealed into jade, pulsing with life's primordial rhythm.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #y2 [#00FF7F]Regen[] (Stacks).

LOLWeaponsMod:FuJiDouPeng.NAME: Negatron Cloak
LOLWeaponsMod:FuJiDouPeng.FLAVOR: Inverted starscape glows in the lining, diverting magic into the void.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #y3 [#9370DB]Plated Armor[] .

LOLWeaponsMod:HongShuiJing.NAME: Ruby Crystal
LOLWeaponsMod:HongShuiJing.FLAVOR: Heart-of-earth magma forged this crystal, throbbing with a warrior's passion.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #y5 [#FF4500]Temporary HP[] .
